CustomField.description: Represents Name of winner team or 'Draw' if score is equal
CustomField.formula: IF ( (VALUE( LEFT( Score__c , 1 ))) = (VALUE( RIGHT( Score__c , 1 ))), "Draw", IF ( (VALUE( LEFT( Score__c , 1 ))) > (VALUE( RIGHT( Score__c , 1 ))), "Home team", "Visitors" ) )
CustomField.label: Winner
